info.description: API to create Underlying Reg. Adjustment
info.title: Underlying Reg. Adjustment

parameters.name: command
parameters.description: API operations like INVOKE, VALIDATE, PROCESS can be set or by default PROCESS is set

recordIndicator.description: It specifies the type of record that is loaded

adjustmentOrderNumber.description: It specifies the chronological system generated Adjustment order number.

externalOrderReference.description: It specifies the external order identifier for which the order is being placed. This is taken from the interface file

internalRegisterNumber.description: Register ID through which the Underlying register adjustment order is being placed. Allowed values are from the list of Registers created in MFGI for which the user has rights

registerOutID.description: Register ID from which the units are being transferred out. Allowed values are registers from the list of Register IDs based on respective Global and Bearer structure

registerInID.description: Register ID from which the units are being transferred In. Allowed values are registers from the list of Regsiter IDs based on respective Global and Bearer structure

fundID.description: TA Fund ID for which the order is being placed. Allowed values are from the list of TA funds created in MFGI for which the user has rights

shareType.description: Share class code for which the order is being placed. Allowed values are from the list of share classes linked to the Fund

flagConfirmed.description: Flag to specify if the order can be confirmed autimatically upon creation. Allowed values : Y (to enable), N (to disable), Null (=N)

externalRegisterNumber.description: It specifies the external register identifier through which the Underlying register adjustment order is being placed. This is taken from the interface file

registerExternOutID.description: It specifies the transfer out register external register identifier . This is taken from the interface file

registerExternInID.description: It specifies the transfer In register external register identifier . This is taken from the interface file

externalSecurityIDCodeType.description: It specifies the type of Security external identifier.

externalSecurityIDCode.description: It specifies the External identifier for security in interfaced orders.

paymentCurrency.description: The currency in which the payments related to this transaction will be processed (in 3 letter ISO code, Eg: EUR). The LoV is available in Cmess table MONNAIES

receptionMode.description: The mode in which the order is received. For example : 0001 - Telephone, 0002 - Fax. The LoV is available in Cmess table TA_ORDREC.

originalMessageLocation.description: Message source. . The LoV is available in Cmess table TA_ORDREC2

secondaryProviderId.description: Provider ID Code for external Register Equivalence.
